name: Canopic Golem
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.Limited Spell Immunity: The golem automatically succeeds on saving throws against spells of 7th level or lower, and the attack rolls of such spells always miss it.
traits.Unusual Nature: The golem doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.Slam: Melee Weapon Attack: +10+1d10 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 27 (4d10 + 5) force damage.
actions.Crystal Dart: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10+1d10 + 5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) force damage.
